title: Sticky wages cause unemployment when AD falls

content.prompt: Following a decrease in aggregate demand, an increase in unemployment will result if

choices.label: prices and wages quickly adjust to equilibrium levels
prices and nominal wages are slow to adjust in the short run

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
